program_title: Water and Waste Disposal Loan Guarantees
program_description: This program helps private lenders provide affordable financing to improve access to clean, reliable water and waste disposal systems in rural areas. Affordable terms and good practices can save tax dollars and may be necessary for businesses to locate or expand operations.
eligible_applicants: Eligible applicants include lenders with the legal authority, financial strength, and experience to operate a successful lending program.
eligible_lenders_examples: Federal and state-chartered banks; Savings and loan institutions; Farm Credit banks with direct lending authority; Credit unions; Additional nonregulated lending institutions approved by USDA
eligible_borrowers: State and local governments; Non-profit organizations; Federally recognized Tribes
eligible_areas_description: Cities, villages, towns, townships, and federally recognized Tribal lands with fewer than 50,000 residents
eligible_facilities: Drinking water; Sanitary sewer; Solid waste disposal; Stormwater disposal
funds_use_construction_projects_descript: Funds can be used for construction projects and can cover costs such as engineering fees and land, legal, and environmental analysis costs.
funds_use_non_construction_projects_exam: Equipment to operate, maintain, or protect facilities; Professional service fees for engineering and environmental services; Debt refinancing
how_to_get_started_borrowers_info: Interested borrowers can ask their lender about the USDA Water and Waste Disposal Loan Guarantee program. Information is available at this link: tinyurl.com/WEPWWDLG.
how_to_get_started_lenders_contact: Interested lenders can contact the USDA Rural Development Community Programs director in the state where the proposed project is located. A list of state offices is available at this link: tinyurl.com/RDStateOffices.
who_can_answer_questions_local_office: Your local USDA Rural Development office can help. A list of offices is available at this link: tinyurl.com/RDStateOffices.
who_can_answer_questions_onerd_initiativ: You will find information about USDA Rural Development's OneRD Loan Guarantee initiative at this link: tinyurl.com/USDA-1RD-LG.
qr_code_website_label: Water and Waste Disposal Loan Guarantees Website
note_general_disclaimer: Because information changes, always consult official program instructions or contact your local USDA Rural Development office for help.
note_equal_opportunity_statement: USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender.
